code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';const useFetchIfsc=ifscCode=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const BASE_URL='https://ifsc.razorpay.com/';useEffect(()=>{if(!ifscCode)return;const fetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const response=await fetch(`https://ifsc.razorpay.com/${ifscCode}`);if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch data');}const result=await response.json();setData(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[ifscCode]);return{data,loading,error};};export default useFetchIfsc;
